intro: Youngia baoxingensis, commonly known as the Baoxing yellow flower, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers. The plant is characterized by its yellow ray florets and dark褐色 disk florets. It typically grows in moist, temperate climates and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
